channel.title: Shotgun Muzzle flash fix?
channel.description:
Hello,
Recently, I decided to to a little remaster on BMS by adding customs skins, sounds and tweaking a few scripts. This has been going pretty well so far, as I am quite familiar with both scripting and texturing from previous projects.
One thing I am absolutely stumped on though is the absence of a muzzle flash from the shotgun once you apply custom texture to it. I have spent no small portion of time trying to fix the issue with no avail.
Has anyone had any success in fixing this problem?

item.title: Shotgun Muzzle flash fix?
item.dc:creator: Creadoris
item.description:
Hello,

Recently, I decided to to a little remaster on BMS by adding customs skins, sounds and tweaking a few scripts. This has been going pretty well so far, as I am quite familiar with both scripting and texturing from previous projects.

One thing I am absolutely stumped on though is the absence of a muzzle flash from the shotgun once you apply custom texture to it. I have spent no small portion of time trying to fix the issue with no avail.

Has anyone had any success in fixing this problem?
